name: AI Factory (Davidox)
description:
You are a worker in a factory run by an artificial intelligence, but something seems wrong. You have to deactivate the reactor to know what's happening to the AI of the building. Game made by Davidox, Voicelines, sound effects and music by DarthThePao. Disclamer:

If you have a controller connected to your computer you can't move the camera with the mouse (you can also move it with the controller), so if you want to play without the controller disconnect it.
